title: InfoYouth
titre_p1: You are looking for the right university to complete your course
contenu_p1: Our site will help you choose the right option and will also make it easier for you to search for universities in Tunisia.
titre_p2: You are looking for the nearest university accommodation for your place of study
contenu_p2: You can find in our website the best strategic sites closest.
contenu_p3: You can find the nearest restaurants, cafes and sports clubs to your place of study through the site easily.
